Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Plus Arkon Park Hotel in Gdansk (Oliwa), you'll be minutes from Gdansk International Fair and Olivia Business Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Gdansk University and Alfa Centrum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 81 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Best Western Plus Arkon Park Hotel in Gdansk (Oliwa), you'll be minutes from Gdansk International Fair and Olivia Business Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Gdansk University and Alfa Centrum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gdansk International Fair - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Olivia Business Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Gdansk University - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Alfa Centrum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Oliwa Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Abbot's Palace - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Oliwa Cathedral - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Sopot Hippodrome - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Ergo Arena - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Jelitkowo Beach - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Zoo Gdansk - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Tri City Landscape Park - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Manhattan Shopping Centre - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Sierakowskich Manor - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Lysa Gora Ski Area - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Plus Arkon Park Hotel is Gdansk (GDN-Lech Walesa) - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
